text: Abandu bebe nibamufunania, -nibamuboolela mbu; “olekha injila yabakofu, olamayaana!”	Naboola mbu; “Mufunaninjia khu Nyasaye naye yalunjisiye, nesheritsanga bilia ebiamutsokaasinjia ninaye tawe, halali Nyasaye wanje nachama likhuwa(okhuba nalo liba) Nyasaye yamanya obulayi buli eshindu, Koo shimwitsulilanga tawe
